## Problem 2. Data visualization

```{r}
sst_clean <- sst |>
  mutate(date = ymd(date),
         year = factor(year(date), levels = 2018:2023),
         month = month(date, label = TRUE, abbr = TRUE)) |>
  filter(!is.na(year)) |>
  group_by(year, month) |>
  summarize(mean_monthly_sst = round(mean(temp, na.rm = TRUE), 1),
            .groups = "drop")

sst_clean |> 
  slice_sample(n = 5)

str(sst_clean)
```
